questions.question_text: Which of the following shows giving permissions to the group owners for read and execute, giving file owner permission for read, write, and execute, and giving all others permissions for execute?
Which of the following explains the file permissions for -rwx-rwx-x?

choices.D: The group has read, write, and execution permissions; the owner has read, write, and execution permissions; everybody else has execution permission.
choices.A: The owner has read, write, and execution permissions; the group has read, write and execution permissions; everybody else has read permission.
choices.C: The owner has read, write, and execution permissions; the group has read, write, and execution permissions; everybody else has execution permission.
choices.B: The owner has read and execution permissions; the group has read, write, and execution permissions; everybody else has write permission.

questions.question_text: When issuing the command ls -l (filename), what is the correct order of user permissions?

discussion.content:
Answers are inconsistent ... (copy/paste error ?).
Choices of the original questions are:
a. group, owner, everybody else
b. everybody else, group, owner
c. owner, everybody else, group
d. owner, group, everybody else
and answer is D

choices.C: A virus that replicates itself over the network infecting numerous vulnerable systems.
choices.D: A type of malicious code that is injected into a legitimate application. An attacker can program a logic bomb to delete itself from the disk after it performs the
choices.A: A piece of malware that downloads and installs other malicious content from the Internet to perform additional exploitation on an affected system.
choices.B: A type of malware that executes instructions determined by the nature of the Trojan to delete files, steal data, and compromise the integrity of the underlying operating system, typically by leveraging social engineering and convincing a user to install such software.

discussion.content: Answer is B. Its an official question from the Cisco 210-250 press book practice exam
Right now, SIEM can collect all options

questions.question_text: SIEM solutions can collect logs from popular host security products, including which of the following?
